title: For People Having Trouble With Invasion: Onslaught
body:
> {{champion:40}} (Support) {{item:3504}} {{item:3107}} {{item:3174}} {{item:3194}} Windspeaker's Blessing.
> {{champion:78}} (Tank) {{item:3109}} {{item:3190}} {{item:3083}} {{item:3194}} Stoneborn Pact.
> {{champion:222}} (Marksman) {{item:3091}} {{item:3124}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3034}} Fervor of Battle.
> {{champion:103}} (Mage) {{item:3165}} {{item:3146}} {{item:3108}}  {{item:3285}} Thunderlord's Decree (10% Scaling CDR from Glyphs).

These are all builds that I have won with. They will get you a win with relative ease. For the No Marksman/Utility Missions, simply go Support {{champion:99}} and maybe sub out the Adaptive Helm for a bit more AP, and go ADC {{champion:103}} (she has pretty good Base AS and AS Growth).

replies.body:
Please refrain from playing AD {{champion:81}}.

If you're _**that**_ desperate to play him, please build him AP and take up the 'Mage' slot in your team comp.
Please don't load into a game as Poppy with Grasp and Rush a Sunfire. That build is about as selfish and useless as you can get.
